project.title: Slug Slasher
project.description:
!format **Slug Slasher** is an action platformer all about saving the world from an onslaught of giant, evil slugs. Currently in development, the project started its life as a small extracurricular endeavor, and is now planned to release on major platforms!
With every facet of its design geared towards creating a fun, exciting experience for players of all ages and skill levels, the game has been met with a very positive response at events such as Indy PopCon, the Midwest Gaming Classic, and PixelPop Festival.
As a part of the game's core three-person team, I have been responsible for the production of almost all final in-game content including character art, environmental art, code, and sound effects. Additionally, I have been the team's primary manager, coordinating development, business affairs, and marketing, and have been the primary point of contact for working with an independent musician.
project.task: Writing and maintaining all game code
Creating all game visuals and art assets
Compiling, editing, and implementing all sound effects
